main

Class ClackClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ClackClient

  • public class ClackClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Parent class that is used to represent the client user.
    Author:
    Matt Vines

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClackClient()
      Default constructor with no inputs Will set name to "Anon" Will set host name to "localHost" closed connection set to false port is set to 7000
      ClackClient(java.lang.String userName)
      Will set host name to "localHost" port is set to 7000 closed connection set to false
      ClackClient(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String hostName)
      Construction based on a username and host name given Port is set to defualt = 7000 Closed connection set to false
      ClackClient(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String hostName, int port)
      constructor creates an instance based on username hostname and port number closed connection set to false
